item.title: 德国科技复兴的希望因缺乏创新而停滞不前
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，克里斯蒂娜-基里亚索格洛（Christina Kyriasoglou）将探讨德国周日全国大选后的科技产业前景。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Christina Kyriasoglou looks at prospects for the tech industry in Germany after the country’s national elections on Sunday.】

item.title: 地缘政治丛林大火威胁二十国集团的全球多边主义
item.description: 我是高级经济编辑布伦丹-默里（Brendan Murray），在开普敦为您报道。今天我们将关注在开普敦举行的二十国集团（G-20）财长会议。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Brendan Murray, a senior economics editor reporting from Cape Town. Today we’re looking at the meeting of G-20 finance chiefs in that city. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 美国码头工人合同被称为全球港口的 "黄金标准
item.description: 去年 10 月导致美国集装箱贸易半数停滞的码头工人工会已投票批准了与雇主签订的新劳动合同。一位工会负责人称这份协议是全球港口的 "黄金标准"。【原文：The dockworker union that brought half of US container trade to a halt last October has voted to ratify a new labor contract with their employers. A union chief called the deal the “gold standard” for ports globally.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率降至 6.88%，为今年最低水平
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率上周降至今年最低水平，但不足以刺激贷款活动反弹。【原文：US mortgage rates dropped last week to the lowest level this year, but not enough to spur a rebound lending activity.】

item.title: 美国共和党希望星链公司从拜登 420 亿美元互联网计划中分一杯羹
item.description: 当美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）投入 420 亿美元支持在全美普及高速互联网时，他承诺将采用老式方法--铺设绵延数英里的光纤线路。【原文：When President Joe Biden put $42 billion behind making high-speed internet accessible across the US, he committed to doing it the old-fashioned way – with miles upon miles of fiber-optic lines.】

item.title: 德国 2 月电力成本飙升，行业雪上加霜
item.description: 风力发电量的下滑将德国的电价推向了一年中这一时期的创纪录水平，因为能源成本仍然是欧洲最大经济体的选民和各行各业极为关注的问题。【原文：A slump in wind power generation is pushing Germany’s electricity prices to record levels for this time of year, as energy costs remain a critical concern for voters and industries in Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: Spotify 首席执行官敦促欧盟打击藐视大科技法的苹果公司
item.description: Spotify Technology SA 首席执行官丹尼尔-埃克（Daniel Ek）指责苹果公司一直藐视欧盟的大科技规则，从而升级了与苹果公司的长期争执。【原文：Spotify Technology SA’s Chief Executive Officer Daniel Ek escalated a long-time row with Apple Inc. after he accused it of consistently flouting the European Union’s Big Tech rules.】

item.title: 英伟达迎来最关键的财报日
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）的财报已成为华尔街每年最重要的事件之一。在 DeepSeek 颠覆了人工智能基础设施的前景之后，它的最新财报可能是迄今为止最关键的一次。【原文：Nvidia earnings have become some of the most important events of the year for Wall Street. And it’s latest results may be its most critical yet, coming after DeepSeek scrambled the outlook for AI infrastructure.】

item.title: 以色列中央银行建议拨款 8.41 亿美元用于战争援助
item.description: 以色列中央银行建议贷款人在未来两年内留出多达 30 亿谢克尔（约合 8410 亿美元）的资金，用于为因战争造成的经济损失而苦苦挣扎的公民提供福利。【原文：Israel’s central bank is advising lenders to put aside as much as 3 billion shekels ($841 billion) over the next two years, to be spent on benefits for citizens struggling with the economic outcomes of war.】

item.title: 西班牙国防冠军将为投资者提供计划一瞥
item.description: Indra Sistemas SA 公司的新任执行主席将向投资者介绍他的计划，即加快公司从技术转向国防的步伐，这也是西班牙打造国家冠军的更广泛愿望的一部分。【原文：Indra Sistemas SA’s new executive chairman is set to offer investors a glimpse of his plan to accelerate the company’s pivot to defense from technology, part of Spain’s broader aspirations to build a national champion.】

item.title: Nextalia 据称将探索出售意大利财富管理公司 Firstance
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 Nextalia 正在探索意大利财富科技公司 Firstance 的各种选择，包括可能的出售。【原文：Private equity firm Nextalia is exploring options for Italian wealth tech firm Firstance including a possible sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DWS 称德国股市将因强劲盈利而继续反弹
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）资产管理部门 DWS 集团欧洲股票联席主管马库斯-波普（Marcus Poppe）表示，大选后德国股市可能会继续反弹，因为盈利依然强劲，估值仍然便宜。【原文：German stocks will likely keep rallying after the election as earnings remain strong and valuations are still cheap, said Marcus Poppe, co-head of European equities at DWS Group, the asset management arm of Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.title: DeepSeek 下调非高峰期价格以平衡人工智能需求
item.description: DeepSeek 在非高峰时段提供高达 75% 的折扣，以减少对其应用程序编程接口的需求高峰。【原文：DeepSeek is offering discounts of up to 75% during off-peak hours to reduce spikes in demand for its application programming interface.】

item.title: 大盘股下跌，选股者持有的轻型科技股成为福星
item.description: 自全球金融危机以来，选股者持有苹果公司和英伟达公司等巨头股票的比例最小，在科技股下滑的今年，这提高了他们的基金业绩。【原文：Stock pickers are holding their smallest allocations of megacap names such as Apple Inc. and Nvidia Corp. since the global financial crisis, boosting their funds’ performance in a year that has kicked off with a slide in technology shares.】

item.title: 英伟达动摇的不败光环将面临财报考验
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的财报将决定人工智能能否重新成为华尔街股市上涨的主要推动力，或者在七大科技股跌入调整区间后引发更多疲软。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s earnings are set to dictate whether artificial intelligence can regain its status as the key driver behind Wall Street gains — or trigger more weakness after the Magnificent Seven group of technology stocks fell into correction territory.】

item.title: 英国石油公司在埃利奥特的压力下重新关注石油，但削减了回购计划
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）宣布将重心转回其核心油气业务，并承诺出售资产和减少开支，但同时也大幅放缓了其至关重要的股票回购步伐。【原文：BP Plc announced a major pivot back to its core oil and gas business and promised to sell assets and reduce spending, but also sharply slowed the pace of its crucial share buybacks.】

item.title: 国债反弹推动德债利差降至数月最低
item.description: 本月国债反弹，推动收益率下降，接近德债收益率，因为交易商押注美国将加大降息力度，欧洲将增加借贷。【原文：A rally in Treasuries this month has driven down yields closer to German debt, as traders bet on bigger US interest-rate cuts and more borrowing in Europe.】

item.title: 面条制造商日清计划大举投资，期待需求回升
item.description: 全球最大的方便面制造商之一日清食品控股株式会社首席执行官表示，该公司计划在未来几年内投资 "数亿美元"，用于在日本和其他地区的扩张。【原文：Nissin Foods Holdings Co., one of the world’s largest instant noodle makers, plans to invest “many hundreds of millions of dollars” in the next several years for expansion in Japan and elsewhere, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 伊多西亚获得债券持有人生命线，关键药品交易仍未达成
item.description: Idorsia Ltd.同意对其债务负担进行全面调整，并从债券持有人处获得新的融资，以避免这家陷入困境的瑞士生物技术集团出现迫在眉睫的流动性危机。【原文：Idorsia Ltd. agreed an overhaul of its debtload and new financing from bondholders to stave off a looming liquidity crunch at the struggling Swiss biotechnology group.】

item.title: 巨型金矿所在地印度尼西亚推出金银银行业务
item.description: 印度尼西亚推出了首家金银银行，旨在将数吨私人持有的黄金引入东南亚最大经济体的金融体系。【原文：Indonesia has launched its first bullion banks in a bid to draw tons of privately held gold into the financial system of Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 法国 Altice 达成债权人协议，削减 86 亿欧元债务
item.description: Altice France SA 与大多数债权人达成协议，将把这家法国电信公司的债务削减 86 亿欧元（约合 90 亿美元）。【原文：Altice France SA and a majority of its creditors have reached an agreement that would slash the French telecommunications company’s debt by €8.6 billion ($9 billion).】

item.title: 特朗普担忧加剧，台湾下调 2025 年经济增长预期
item.description: 台湾下调了对今年经济增长的预测，表明其担心特朗普政府的政策对其经济的影响。【原文：Taiwan lowered its prediction for growth this year, signaling its concern about the impact of the Trump administration’s policies on its economy.】

item.title: Sibanye 退出内华达锂业合资企业
item.description: Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. 取消了在澳大利亚 Ioneer Ltd. 开发的美国大型锂矿中持有主要股份的计划。【原文：Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. scrapped plans to take a major stake in a large US lithium mine being developed by Australia’s Ioneer Ltd.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁考验欧盟打击苹果和美达的决心
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对损害美国一些大公司利益的罚款进行报复，欧盟打击硅谷势力的决心将受到极限考验。【原文：The European Union’s resolve to take on the might of Silicon Valley is set to be tested to the limit after Donald Trump threatened retaliation for fines that hurt some of America’s biggest companies.】

item.title: 南非数据改革后通胀加速
item.description: 南非统计局修订了用于计算家庭支出的数据后，南非通胀率加速上升，使决策者有理由对下月降息持谨慎态度。【原文：South African inflation accelerated after the statistics office revised the data used to calculate household expenditure, giving policymakers reason to be cautious about cutting interest rates next month.】

item.title: 分析师称泰铢走强将面临泰国降息的阻力
item.description: 在泰国央行意外下调基准利率后，泰国货币的强势预计将有所缓和。【原文：Thailand’s currency is expected to moderate in strength after the nation’s central bank unexpectedly cut its benchmark interest rate.】

item.title: Neuberger Berman 为新房地产基金融资 10 亿美元
item.description: Neuberger Berman 集团为其最新的房地产私募股权二级基金募集了 10.5 亿美元，超出目标约 30%。【原文：Neuberger Berman Group has raised $1.05 billion for its latest real estate private equity secondary fund, exceeding its target by about 30%.】

item.title: 印尼与苹果公司达成协议，标志着 iPhone 禁售令终结
item.description: 苹果公司与印度尼西亚签署了一项投资协议，为在这个东南亚最大的国家恢复销售 iPhone 16 铺平了道路。【原文：Apple Inc. has signed an agreement with Indonesia to invest in the country, paving the way for sales of the iPhone 16 to resume in Southeast Asia’s largest nation.】

item.title: 泡沫红茶制造商 Mixue 首次公开募股，投资者寻求 18 亿港元保证金贷款
item.description: 美雪集团的首次公开募股备受追捧，香港个人投资者申请借贷超过 1.8 万亿港元（约合 2,340 亿美元）来购买该股票，比中国最大的泡泡茶制造商的发行价高出数千倍。【原文：Mixue Group’s initial public offering has become so sought after that Hong Kong individual investors applied to borrow more than HK$1.8 trillion ($234 billion) to buy the stock, or thousands of times more than what China’s biggest bubble-tea maker is offering.】

item.title: 德国财政部长认为国防开支大有可为
item.description: 德国看守财政部长约尔格-库基斯（Joerg Kukies）表示，即使在新一届议会于下月宣誓就职之前，德国立法者也可能采取行动增加国防开支。【原文：German lawmakers could move to ramp up defense spending even before a new parliament is sworn in next month, according to the country’s caretaker finance minister, Joerg Kukies.】
